scenes.visual_prompt: A pristine, dark chocolate bar slowly breaking apart, revealing a smooth, rich interior. Soft golden hour lighting, extreme close-up.
scenes.audio_prompt: Subtle crunch and quiet ambient sound.
scenes.motion_prompt: Slow push in on the breaking chocolate.

scenes.visual_prompt: A perfectly tempered piece of dark chocolate melting sensuously on a warm surface, forming a glossy pool. Soft, warm overhead lighting, close-up, shallow depth of field.
scenes.motion_prompt: Static shot with very subtle steam rising.
